node.title: AXIM
node.content:
About the Ease & AXIM Partnership

Ease and AXIM have integrated to make it easy to offer and manage AXIM?s health and welfare administration services. With this integration, plans can be added in Ease and employees can directly enroll in those plans through Ease. Additionally, enrollment data can be submitted directly to AXIM via Ease.

About AXIM

A unique partner, AXIM Fringe Solutions Group, LLC (AXIM FSG), is the nation?s first and only health and welfare administration and compliance firm that is also a government contractor.
AXIM partners with government contractors as an SDVOSB (Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business) to provide consulting, benefits administration, and DOL/ACA compliance for wage determination contracts (Service Contract Act and Davis-Bacon Act).


AXIM?s proprietary technology provides end to end integration from payroll to reporting to deliver a robust solution in the government contracting industry. With over 10 years, our founder, Jim Campbell leads the organization and our partners in delivering total solutions that maximize benefits, administration, and compliance reporting of the H/W while maximizing the profitability of government contracts.


AXIM provides peace of mind to our clients and partners with a 100% audit guarantee and is proud to highlight, AXIM has ZERO infractions or penalties while managing the Health and Welfare Administration of our over 200 clients.

node.title: Reliance Standard
node.content:
About Ease & Reliance Standard

With our Reliance Standard partnership, you will now be able to submit and send required enrollment data for Reliance Standard?s dental and vision plans directly to Ease. For self-billed and employer-paid plans, this partnership eliminates the need to process adds, changes, and terms. Now, Ease will be the only source of data.

With this partnership, you will be able to easily offer and manage Reliance Standard?s Dental and Vision plans, as well as self-billing options for voluntary plans.

This partnership is comprised of two parts:
1. Dental and Vision plans will be available as part of our EaseConnect+ connection.
2. Self-billing is available for Reliance Standard?s voluntary and employer-paid plans.

About Reliance Standard

Reliance Standard is a solutions-based company with a history of innovation in workforce management and employee benefits delivery. For over 100 years, Reliance Standard has been a leader in employee benefits and retirement services. We offer a broad portfolio of employee benefit solutions that provide millions of people with benefits to protect and secure their financial future. We help companies take care of their employees by delivering a unique experience that features innovative tools and advanced technology to address a fast-evolving marketplace.

In 2020 Reliance Standard continued to be one of the top group benefits carriers, and among the fastest growing voluntary benefits carriers, in the United States. We are rated A+ (Superior) by AM Best and A+ (Strong) by Standard & Poor's. Our portfolio of employer-paid, contributory and voluntary (employee-paid) solutions allows groups to meet all of their ancillary benefits needs with a single partner, on a single platform. Our most recent Net Promoter Score among clients is 51, 38% higher than the industry average.

Reliance Standard is a proud member of The Tokio Marine Group. Originally the oldest and leading insurance company in Japan, Tokio Marine has US roots dating back to 1880 and is now one of the world's largest, most dynamic insurance companies on the planet. Reliance Standard joined as a member company in 2012. We embrace the philosophy and culture of Good Company, a blueprint for integrity, service and operational health shared by our sister companies around the globe. Our shared corporate values emphasize this foundation, promoting transparency, collaboration, discipline and community.

Additional Resources

Reliance Standard Website

node.title: Morgan White Group
node.content:
About the Ease & Morgan White Group (MWG) Partnership

Ease and the Morgan White Group have partnered to provide brokers with tools to quickly and efficiently manage groups with 2-250 employees.

  1. Morgan White Group Will Set Up Your Groups - Submit your new business through MWG and they will help you transition your clients to online enrollment so that you can focus on growing your book of business. Leverage MWG?s dedicated staff to help you and your team get up to speed with Ease.
  2. MWG Rate Libraries - Access to all MWG plan rates are available through Ease to quickly and efficiently build your groups and plans.
  3. MWG Document Library - Gain access to all important carrier documents, links to medical SBCs, provider lookups, wellness programs, and more inside Ease.
  4. Submit Electronically - Avoid having to key in spreadsheets to submit enrollments. MWG offers the option for you to submit enrollments directly to them through Ease's electronic submission feature.

About Morgan White Group

John J. Morgan and David R. White founded Morgan White Group, Inc. in 1987 as a simple insurance agency, focusing on group supplemental products. In the decades since, the company has expanded into a holding company comprised of nearly a dozen wholly owned subsidiaries operating in all 50 states, as well as Latin America and the Caribbean. The catalyst for the company?s dramatic expansion has been the ability to identify niche or under-served markets and create innovative, custom solutions.

The group includes multiple sales agencies, which offer both group and individual insurance products domestically and internationally. Morgan White Group also includes two third-party administrators, a 401(k) administration and record-keeping firm, and a marketing agency that partners with outside brokers across the country.

At Morgan White Group, we look forward to the challenge of solving customers? medical, dental and vision insurance needs today, and in the future. We are committed to making the investment in technology, equipment, and personnel to provide our customers with the latest, most up-to-date tools available, to solve their insurance needs.

node.title: Eusoh
node.content:
About the Ease & Eusoh Partnership

With the Ease and Eusoh integration, easily access Eusoh?s affordable financial protection of dogs and cats. Eusoh?s plans can quickly be added and set up in Ease, and any adds, changes, and terminations will be automatically sent to Eusoh on a weekly basis.

About Eusoh 

Eusoh is a community health sharing plan that reimburses its members for their pet's medical, wellness, illness, and routine care expenses. Eusoh is not insurance. Their proprietary platform has made financial protection of dogs and cats affordable and transparent through its community-based pet coverage plan.

Eusoh is a new and better way of doing coverage. Here?s how:

  • Eusoh has no premiums and no networks.
  • Transparency. All coverage and reimbursement for procedures are totally transparent to the community.
  • Eusoh is easy to use and expense submissions can be done instantly online or on the cellphone.
  • They are community-based. Their members help one another afford the peace of mind for their pet care. It shifts the conversation from cost to care.
  • They offer better coverage. Accident, illness, and wellness are all covered.
  • Their members have been achieving a 50% cost savings against conventional insurance.

Eusoh FAQ

Every day, Unum helps millions of people get back to what matters most: their families, their finances and their futures. We keep employees going by delivering better ways to access disability, life, accident, critical illness, dental, and vision benefits through the workplace.

Unum offers companies a full array of financial protection benefits solutions and services, including benefits communication, enrollment services and claims support. Our award-winning absence management and vocational rehabilitation services help ease the disruption to businesses and employees by enabling them to return to full capacity as soon as they’re able. And we’re changing the way benefits get done by automating and integrating to eliminate some of your most time-consuming administrative tasks.

Our products and services meet the needs of a modern workforce that includes four generations, expanding ethnic diversity and changing family dynamics. When you've got Unum, you’ve got the strength, compassion and expertise of our people standing behind you - ready to help your company and your employees thrive.

Benefit Resource (BRI) administers tax-free benefits (commuter benefit plans, flexible spending accounts, health savings accounts, health reimbursement accounts), specialty accounts, COBRA, and direct billing services. For over 27 years, our clients and partners have relied on our commitment to innovative technology, high-touch service, and expertise to guide them to the right benefits decisions.

  • Technology: Get one online portal, one mobile app, and one benefits card to streamline your benefits offering. Additionally, our affordable decision support tool solution can maximize your participation rates.
  • Service: Every client receives a dedicated specialist that provides one-on-one care, as well as support to communicate plan offerings and encourage enrollment.
  • Expertise: Our certified experts ensure convenient and compliant plan administration. All legislative changes, education needs, and plan document requirements are proactively addressed to provide you with peace of mind.

node.title: CoPatient
node.content:
About the Ease & CoPatient Partnership

Ease and CoPatient are working together to help your groups deal with their medical bills. With their proprietary knowhow, CoPatient helps employees make sure that their bills are fair and free of errors. They gather and review all of the necessary documentation, such as EOBs and itemized bills, and advocate on behalf of employees to resolve common medical billing issues and find savings. Although results vary from case to case, CoPatient usually finds at least 20% in savings on medical bills that qualify for advocacy.

About CoPatient

CoPatient was formed by a group of healthcare and technology experts to help consumers make sure their medical bills are fair and accurate. We review medical bills and advocate on behalf of patients so they never pay more than they should.

Our advocates have decades of experience across the healthcare industry, and know how to work with insurance companies and healthcare providers. In combination with our proprietary software, CoPatient can identify common medical billing issues, find savings opportunities, and negotiate a fair price for employees. Although results vary from case to case, CoPatient often finds average savings of at least 20% on medical bills that qualify for negotiations.

node.content:
About the Ease & CyberScout Partnership 

With Ease and CyberScout, you can easily offer your groups identity and data defense services ? from proactive protection and education, to online monitoring and security tools, to successful resolution. CyberScout identity management services provide a comprehensive resource from a trusted provider that every employee needs in today?s connected world. When partnering with CyberScout, you will:

  • Strengthen client relationships with a cost-effective benefit that keeps consultants and employers financially satisfied and employees productive and happy.
  • Provide unparalleled customer service with unlimited, multilingual 24/7 resolution assistance from fraud investigators with an average of 11 years? experience.
  • Modern protections including social media monitoring and up to $2 million of expense reimbursement.
  • Grow your current product portfolio and attract new clients with innovative identity management services that minimize threats, monitor personal information and manage recovery.

CyberScout identity management services are available on an employer paid or voluntary basis with 10 or more enrolled.

About CyberScout

Since 2003, CyberScout has set the standard for full-spectrum identity, privacy and data security services, offering proactive protection, education, and data theft resolution as well as breach preparedness and response. Serving approximately 45 million individuals worldwide and the designated identity theft services provider for more than 770,000 businesses, including 27% of Fortune 100 companies. CyberScout combines extensive experience with world-class service to help individuals and businesses minimize and manage cyber threats.

They provide a fully integrated and interactive CDHC platform for all pretax account based plans including Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs) and Health Reimbursement Arrangements (HRAs), Health Savings Accounts (HSAs) to Commuter Parking and Transit Accounts. In addition we are a leading provider of  COBRA and Direct Premium Billing Administration Services.

ABG serves a broad base of employer clients nationwide from under 50 to over 15,000 participants across all industries. They employ state of the art web based technology systems that allow anytime-anywhere access from all Internet connected devices, Mobile, Tablet or PC with robust interactive on demand tools that build greater employee engagement, increased satisfaction and higher participation. As a customer centric organization, they believe that responsive and high touch service delivery combined with enabling technology creates an unparalleled experience for our customers and their employee participants.

node.title: MDLIVE
node.content:
About the Ease & MDLIVE Partnership 

Ease and MDLIVE are working together to help brokers offer MDLIVE telehealth options so their employees can access board-certified doctors who treat routine, non-emergency medical conditions as well as prescribe medications when necessary, all by phone, secure video or the MDLIVE smartphone app. Add MDLIVE plans directly through Ease and populate supporting documents after providing the plan details.

About MDLIVE

MDLIVE Inc. is focused on delivering high-quality, convenient, cost-effective online medical, dermatological and behavioral healthcare. MDLIVE was founded on the principle that healthcare should be simple, fast and uncomplicated. Since 2009, the company has remained steadfast in its mission to deliver high-quality, convenient and cost-efficient care to patients and organizations across the United States. Through MDLIVE?s comprehensive telehealth platform, millions of people are empowered with 24/7/365 access to the company?s network of board-certified internists, family practitioners, pediatricians, emergency room specialists, dermatologists, psychiatrists, and counselors. The company constantly looks to break scientific and industry barriers by pairing cutting-edge technologies, automation philosophies and evidence-based content with a vision to improve both efficiency and quality. At the same time, Sophie, MDLIVE?s personal health assistant, aims to improve the consumer experience via a multi-channel approach that can evolve quickly as new technologies become available. MDLIVE?s HIPAA- and PHI-compliant, cloud-based platform gives registered users access to virtual consultations through secure online video, phone or the MDLIVE app.

To learn more about how MDLIVE is using telehealth innovations to improve the delivery of healthcare, visit www.MDLIVE.com, download our mobile app or text ?Sophie? to MDLIVE (635483) to register.

Stay connected with MDLIVE and see its latest news on social media. Follow MDLIVE on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and YouTube.

Additional Resources

MDLIVE Website

Members have 3 ways to use the services: app, portal, and card. Average utilization across core freshbenies services is 71%.

node.content:
About the Ease & Alliance Direct Benefits Partnership

Ease and Alliance Direct Benefits (ADB) are working together to provide employers with industry-leading no co-pay telemedicine services, emergency travel assistance, ID theft resolution services, legal plan, and college scholarship and grant programs.

About Alliance Direct Benefits

The Alliance offers these benefits in an array of packages:

  • Teladoc with NO COPAY
  • Roadside Assistance
  • ID Theft
  • Legal Club- Family Plan
  • Global Emergency Services
  • Education Benefits ? Scholarships and Grants

The Value Plan is a 7-benefit package of guaranteed issue, non-insurance benefits that cost as low as $13.00/month for an individual and their dependents. It includes no copay, unlimited access to Teladoc, ID Theft, Legal Club-Family Plan, Global Emergency Services, Roadside Assistance, and Education Benefits all in one package.

The Alliance Protect includes no copay, unlimited access to Teladoc, ID Theft, Legal Club-Family Plan, Global Emergency Services that cost as low as $10.00/ month for an individual, and their dependents.

The Alliance Assist plan includes Roadside Assistance, ID Theft, Legal Club-Family Plan, Global Emergency Services that cost as low as $10.00/ month for an individual, and their dependents.

The Alliance Access plan featuresID Theft, Legal Club-Family Plan, Global Emergency Services, and costs as low as $6.00/ month for an individual and their dependents.

For additional information on benefits, visit www.alliancedirectbenefits.com or contact us at team@alliancedirectbenefits.com.

The Alliance is a not-for-profit association that uses its group buying power to negotiate significant savings on benefits that help members and their families keep more money in their pockets. For more than 30 years, the Alliance has helped tens of thousands of individuals, families, and businesses (large or small) nationwide.

node.title: Allstate Identity Protection
node.content:
About the Ease & Allstate Identity Protection Partnership

Ease and Allstate Identity Protection (formerly InfoArmor) are working together to make it easy to offer employer-paid or voluntary Pro Plus benefits. Allstate Identity Protection Pro Plus will alert members at the first sign of fraud and fully restores any affected identity.

About Allstate Identity Protection

Innovation. It's what we do.

With data breaches at an all-time high, our customers' priorities have changed — and so have we.

InfoArmor, the leader in employee identity and privacy protection, joined the Allstate Corporation family of companies in 2018. Between us, we have more than 100 years of combined experience protecting what people care about most.

Moving forward, we're excited to announce that InfoArmor is now Allstate Identity Protection. Although we've grown and changed over the years, our commitment to clients, partners, individuals, and families has never wavered.

As we evolve, we're solving challenges in more innovative ways than ever before. Our next milestone is the Allstate Digital Footprint, a first-of-it's kind privacy management tool. Now members can see their personal information and how it might expose them to risk — so they can do things no other identity protection provider has helped them do before.

This commitment to innovation is how we service millions of employees at over 3,000 companies in the U.S., including more than 30% of the Fortune 500. Now, with the launch of our new channel partnerships, we're empowering more people to live their best lives online. Backed by a trusted name in protection, with the passion and agility of a startup, we're more dedicated than ever to helping people safeguard their data, identity, and most of all, their privacy.

Additional Resources

node.content:

Make benefits and payroll easy for your groups that use Paylocity. With this integration, payroll and benefits are in sync with automated, daily, changes-only demographic files synced from Ease to Paylocity.

  • Enter new hires into Paylocity and the integration will automatically update Ease with new hire data
  • Deductions will flow over to Paylocity updating the employee?s payroll record with the appropriate benefit deduction
  • Open enrollment deductions for the new year are automatically loaded into Paylocity
  • Automated, daily, changes-only demographic files synced from Paylocity to Ease and daily deduction files synced from Ease to Paylocity

About Paylocity

Simplify payroll with intuitive, powerful cloud software that reduces administrative burden and puts real insight and analytics at your fingertips.

Headquartered just outside Chicago, Paylocity has revolutionized the marketplace for payroll and human resources professionals for more than 20 years. Founded in 1997, Steve Sarowitz built Paylocity on the basis of innovation in a stale industry. Today, with the guidance of our CEO Steve Beauchamp, Paylocity continues to push the envelope not only for our clients, but also for our employees.

node.title: ADP Workforce Now
node.content:
About the Ease and ADP Workforce Now Partnership

Ease & ADP Workforce Now have partnered to make payroll and benefits easy.

Ease and ADP Workforce Now. With this integration, you can help them eliminate duplicate data entry, seamlessly update employee records with demographic changes and benefit deductions, and easily maintain accurate payroll data.

  • Employees added in ADP Workforce Now get added to Ease
  • Automated, daily, changes-only demographic data synced from ADP Workforce Now to Ease and daily deduction data synced from Ease to ADP Workforce Now
  • HR admins can run changes at any time with the push of a button.
  • Deductions from open enrollment or any other benefit changes are automatically sent to ADP Workforce Now throughout the year, no matter the month.
  • Employees can add dependents and make other changes to their plan and see the change in the appropriate pay period.

About ADP Workforce Now

Save time and money and gain peace of mind with ADP Workforce Now, the easy-to-use and complete human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.

Built from the ground up with a single database, the fully integrated ADP Workforce Now suite features Human Resource Management, Payroll, Benefits, Talent Management, Time & Labor Management and HR Analytics capabilities. From rock-solid payroll to proactive compliance to managing employees across borders, ADP Workforce Now frees you from mundane administrative tasks so you can focus on your people and drive business results. Plus, Workforce Now integrates simply and securely with other best-of-breed HR and business applications through convenient APIs and the ADP Marketplace. ADP Workforce Now equips you with the tools not just to track HR information, but to help you manage your workforce and make data-driven decisions. And, as you grow, you can add the functionality you need.

Leverage Word & Brown's dedicated staff to help you and your team get up to speed with ease.  
  2. Word & Brown Rate Libraries - Access to all Word & Brown plan rates are available through Ease to quickly and efficiently build your groups. The Word & Brown Library populates simple employee on-screen enrollment education and guidance, provider directory links and Summary of Benefits & Coverage (SBC).
  3. Document Library - Gain access to all important carrier documents, such as medical SBCs, inside Ease.
  4. Submit Electronically - Avoid having to key in spreadsheets to submit enrollments. Word & Brown offers the option for you to submit enrollments directly to them through Ease's electronic submission feature.
  5. WBQuote and WBQuote Lite Integrate With Ease - With a few clicks, you can transfer quote data including group, census, carrier plan benefits & rates as well as contributions and eligibility directly and conveniently into a new group set up.

About Word & Brown

More than 30 years ago, John Word and Rusty Brown introduced Word & Brown to the market with a commitment to - Service of Unequalled Excellence. - Today, Word & Brown's service commitment remains the same. Executive and Regional Leadership team members have more than 200 years of cumulative experience in the health insurance and employee benefits industry and a history of service and technology innovation.  

Since 1985, Word & Brown and its sister companies have been recognized leaders in the health insurance and employee benefits industry. They established the largest multi-carrier, small group private health insurance exchange nearly 20 years ago. Wherever you write business, whatever your agency size, and no matter what market or product focus, they are ready to assist you - online, on the phone, and in person.

node.title: Aflac
node.content:
About the Ease & Aflac Partnership

Ease and Aflac have connected to make benefits enrollment easier for your clients and their employees.

Together, Aflac and Ease deliver a flexible solution that combines Eases user-friendly benefits administration developed by brokers with hassle-free access to Aflac supplemental insurance plans. Employees can participate in their enrollment through Aflac's Everwell platform directly from Ease, and all information is submitted directly to Aflac from the Ease system for a fully seamless experience.

About Aflac

Aflac is a Fortune 500 company that helps provide protection to more than 50 million people worldwide. When a policyholder or insured gets sick or hurt, Aflac pays cash benefits promptly and fairly for eligible claims, directly to the insured (unless assigned otherwise). For more than six decades, Aflac supplemental insurance policies have given policyholders the opportunity to focus on recovery, not financial stress.

Individual coverage is underwritten by American Family Life Assurance Company of Columbus. Group coverage is underwritten by Continental American Insurance Company (CAIC), a wholly-owned subsidiary of Aflac Incorporated. CAIC is not licensed to solicit business in New York, Guam, Puerto Rico, or the Virgin Islands. For groups sitused in California, group coverage is underwritten by Continental American Life Insurance Company. For individual coverage in New York or coverage for groups sitused in New York, coverage is underwritten by American Family Life Assurance Company of New York. WWHQ | 1932 Wynnton Road | Columbus, GA 31999
Continental American Insurance Company | Columbia, South Carolina

AGC1902835 IV (10/19)

node.title: Allstate Benefits
node.content:
About the Ease & Allstate Benefits Partnership

Ease and Allstate Benefits have partnered to make benefits enrollment easier! With a prebuilt product offering available in the Ease Marketplace, enrollments in available Allstate Benefits products are easily configured, and employees can view their actual costs per pay period. Enrollment data is transmitted via the established carrier connection and after the initial enrollment submission, ongoing enrollment data, adds, changes and terminations are automatically sent to Allstate Benefits on a scheduled semi-monthly basis.

The prebuilt products available in the Ease Marketplace include:

  • Accident
  • Critical Illness
  • Hospital Indemnity (rates must be configured at the case level)

Additional plans can be custom built; please talk with your Allstate Benefits representative for more details and limitations.

And, with Allstate Benefits, small groups are welcome! The Allstate Benefits and Ease partnership supports groups as small as five participating employees (subject to state regulations and underwriting guidelines).

About Allstate Benefits

As a leading provider of employee benefits, Allstate Benefits has established a strategic Choice Partners? relationship with Ease to provide superior products and exceptional customer experiences through best-in-class technology solutions. With over 50,000 employer groups and more than 4.2 million individual policies in force, we deliver the Good Hands® promise every day.

Allstate Benefits is the marketing name used by American Heritage Life Insurance Company (Home Office, Jacksonville, FL), a subsidiary of The Allstate Corporation. Allstate Benefits is also a marketing name for Allstate Life Insurance Company of New York (Home Office, Hauppauge, NY).

node.title: Covered California for Small Business
node.content:
About the Ease and Covered California for Small Business Partnership

Ease and Covered California for Small Business (CCSB) have connected to make benefit enrollments easier for Covered California's certified agents and General Agents.  CCSB enrollment submissions through Ease will directly connect to CCSB's enrollment system.

This connection means instant set up with Plan Libraries, making rates, benefits, plan summaries, and other details automatically accessible in the brokers' Ease accounts.

About Covered California for Small Business

Covered California for Small Business (CCSB), formerly known as the Small Business Health Options (SHOP) program, allows small businesses throughout California to take advantage of a competitive marketplace, that enables employee choice of coverage and access to the doctors and hospitals they prefer when purchasing insurance for their employees. While offering health insurance to employees is mandatory only for businesses with more than 50 employees, CCSB offers health and dental coverage options for small businesses with 1 to 100 employees. CCSB offers valuable advantages to California small businesses, including:

- Help controlling health care costs and reducing administrative overhead while offering employees a broader choice of health plan coverage options. 

- Improve employee satisfaction by allowing employees to choose the health plan and physician network that works best for them. 

- Choice of multiple insurance plans and health plans provides employees access to a broader choice of physician networks and hospitals not offered through traditional single-carrier models. 

- The convenience of one consolidated monthly bill even while purchasing coverage from multiple carriers. 

- Tax credits for qualifying small business to help offset the cost of providing health insurance to employees."

Additional Resources

Covered CA Website

node.title: Equitable
node.content:
About the Ease & Equitable Partnership

With our Equitable connection, you can easily add and manage Equitables dental, vision, life, disability, critical illness, and accident plans.

About Equitable

Equitable, a subsidiary of Equitable Holdings (NYSE: EQH), has been one of Americas leading financial services providers since 1859. With the mission to help clients secure their financial well-being, the company provides advice, protection and retirement strategies to individuals, families and small businesses. Equitable has brought in leading talent from across the industry to build their employee benefits business, and today, Equitable is among the fastest-growing carriers in the country. Together, Equitable work to turn todays goals into tomorrows accomplishments. Their products are designed to meet the highest standards of a competitive, modern workforce  with a specialty in dental, vision, life, short-term and long-term disability, accident and critical illness.


For any questions about Equitable, please email Equitable-EB@equitable.com.

Equitable is the brand name of the retirement and protection subsidiaries of Equitable Holdings, Inc., including Equitable Financial Life Insurance Company (Equitable Financial) (NY, NY); Equitable Financial Life Insurance Company of America (Equitable America), an AZ stock company with main administrative headquarters in Jersey City, NJ; and Equitable Distributors, LLC. Equitable Advisors is the brand name of Equitable Advisors, LLC (member FINRA, SIPC) (Equitable Financial Advisors in MI & TN). All group insurance products are issued either by Equitable Financial or Equitable America, which have sole responsibility for their respective insurance and are backed solely by their claims-paying obligations. Some products are not available in all states. IU-3635612D (6/21) (Exp. 6/23)

For broker and financial professional use only.

node.title: Dickerson Insurance Services
node.content:
About the Ease and Dickerson Insurance Services Partnership

Ease and Dickerson Insurance Services have partnered to provide brokers with tools to quickly and efficiently manage groups with 2 - 250 employees.

  1. Dickerson Insurance Services Will Set Up Your Groups - Submit your new business through Dickerson Insurance Services and they will help you transition your clients to online enrollment so that you can focus on growing your book of business. Leverage Dickerson Insurance Services dedicated staff to help you and your team get up to speed with ease.  
  2. Submit Electronically - Avoid having to key in spreadsheets to submit enrollments.  Dickerson offers the option for you to submit enrollments directly to them through Eases electronic submission feature.

About Dickerson Insurance Services

Company founder Carl Dickerson launched his insurance brokerage business in 1965, working the multicultural neighborhoods of Los Angeles, California. From this one-man-operation, selling insurance door-to-door, the company has grown to answer the needs of a significant portion of the community throughout California and the United States. The belief that all people should have equal access to affordable health care is still the core of the business.

Today, the company is led by Managing Partners Tony Lee and Michael Wolff. As a result of the companys activities, both political and civic, Dickerson Insurance Services has its roots in the minority and culturally diverse communities of California and offers multilingual support in 11 different languages.

On May 1, 2018, Dickerson Insurance Services announced that it has become an Alera Group company. Through this exciting venture, Dickerson Insurance Services is pleased to bring a national scope that is paired with their continued focus on local service. The company remains headquartered on a spacious campus near the historic Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles. In addition to housing members of our sales team, the corporate office includes quoting, customer service, underwriting, retention, renewal, individual sales, and large group consulting services.

As Dickerson Insurance Services continue to grow, the core of the business is their commitment to serving their customers.

Products supported within this integration include Universal Benefit Account with HRA, HSA, Dependent Care FSA, Healthcare FSA, Transit and Parking, as well as Compliance and COBRA Administration services. About TASC

TASC started in 1975 with a simple, yet innovative idea of enabling small businesses to reap the same tax-advantages as larger companies. After 45 years in business, with a new innovation every two years, TASC now serves more than 80,000 small, medium and large customers. We are blazing new trails with a one-of-a-kind, industry first, instantly configurable benefits cloud platform. Key Benefits Custom Plans = Attract, Engage, Retain and Grow! Your clients care about keeping their employees safe, happy and productive. TASC Universal Benefit Account is the only solution available today that enables your clients to instantly configure more than 60 benefits to create custom plans that meet employee needs where they are in life. Other benefits include Home Office, Emergency Response, Tuition & Loan reimbursements. When nearly any benefit need can be met, participants are more involved, leading to increased engagement, enrollment, contributions, and tax savings. Stand Out! When you are a 'first-mover' in leveraging TASC Universal Benefit Account, a one-of-a-kind industry first, you gain a competitive advantage.6

node.content:
About the Ease & BambooHR Partnership

With the Ease and BambooHR integration, you'll no longer have to update your employees' information in multiple places. This integration automatically syncs employee information from BambooHR to Ease, eliminating duplicative data entries, reducing the risk of errors, and saving you time.

About BambooHR

BambooHR is a connected platform of people-centered solutions that help you spend less time on the operational and more time on improving the employee experience. It gives you a one-stop shop to help you accomplish everything from finding and hiring the right candidates to streamlining compensation to improving individual performance.  Instead of fragmenting the admin and employee experience with siloed systems, BambooHR brings together HR, payroll, time tracking, performance, and over 90 best-in-class integrations into one place. When you make a change to employee data, information flows seamlessly between solutions, which means a whole lot less data entry, better coordination, and happier employees.  Not only does BambooHR give you the complete solution to achieve even more HR and business outcomes, it also sets you free to focus on helping your organization grow and change for the better. 

Additional Resources

node.title: Coastal Payroll
node.content:
About the Ease & Coastal Payroll Partnership

Ease and Coastal Payroll have integrated to keep benefits and payroll in sync. With dedicated service representatives assigned to each client, and technologically robust software solutions, Coastal Payroll can meet individual client needs with the specificity and customization they deserve. 

About Coastal Payroll 

Coastal Payroll brings a human touch to payroll and HR. With dedicated service representatives assigned to each client, and technologically robust software solutions, Coastal Payroll can meet individual client needs with the specificity and customization they deserve. This is reflected in Coastal Payroll’s incredible retention rate. Coastal Payroll began in San Diego in 2007 as a local alternative to the national providers. Over the years, Coastal Payroll has grown to serve thousands of clients around the country, from multiple offices in California—yet, they’ve maintained the same laser focus on customer service. It will always be number one. We have evolved to meet our clients where they are. We still provide the best payroll solutions, integrating exactly what each client needs to grow. We have also created full-service HR solutions—hand-in-glove consulting services that help clients see what they can’t see and fix what they didn’t know was missing.

Additional Resources

node.title: United Concordia Dental
node.content:
About the Ease & United Concordia Dental Partnership With our United Concordia Dental connection, you can easily add and manage United Concordia’s benefit plans. About United Concordia Dental United Concordia Dental has been driven by a simple truth: a healthy mouth is a vital component of a healthy body. Members have access to high-quality oral health care and one of the nation's largest networks through our innovative and easy-to-use dental plans. From standard PPOs and DHMOs to unique add-ons like Smile for Health®-Wellness, United Concordia offers products that support your clients' oral and overall health. Why choose United Concordia Dental?
  • 50+ years of experience. Our focus has always been on providing quality, innovative, easy to-use dental plans for companies of all sizes. It's why so many members and clients trust us with their oral health.
  • Access to a large national network. One of the nation's largest networks means members can receive high-quality care at affordable prices from dentists close to home or work.
  • Dental insurance made easy. Online portals, self-service member tools and an exceptional customer service team make managing benefits a simple and engaging experience.
  • Dedicated to oral wellness. A healthy mouth is a vital part of a healthy body. That's why we’re committed to industry-leading research, products, and wellness education for all.
From Smile for Health®-Wellness, which helps members with certain chronic medical conditions afford treatment for gum disease, to the College Tuition Benefit® program, which helps families afford college, United Concordia’s programs are thoughtfully crafted to support the total well-being of eligible members.
